tell application id "com.googlecode.iterm2" set c to " %@" try set iterm to current window tell current session of iterm if is processing then write text c else tell iterm to create tab with default profile command c end if end tell on error create window with default profile command c end try activate end tell

tell application id "com.apple.Terminal" set windowExist to exists window 1 # starting app or some window opened set command to " %@"
# operation in progres in window 1 or application just started if windowExist and busy of window 1 then activate tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using {command down} delay 0.2 do script command in selected tab of the front window return end if
if windowExist and not busy of window 1 then do script command in selected tab of the front window else do script command end if activate end tell
